Text: For some reason, TPB doesn't pick up on me seeding. Even though it might say 0 seeds, I HAVE been seeding since posting the torrent.
No seeds at all? Seriously i thought more ppl would seed this please seed someone there's way too many leechers

SilentAssassin -- I don't know why this site doesn't show it, but I seed as soon as it's posted. So, go ahead and start your DL even if you see 0 seeds on this site. I don't stop seeding until others get their version and become seeders as well.
Much appreciated for my 2.5 yo son, Chulan!
